Uses of Simulation in framework.lib
 

Subclasses of Simulation in framework.lib
 class Simulation1D
          Gives a concrete simulation for 1 dimensional cellular automata.
 class Simulation2D

Methods in framework.lib that return Simulation
static
<T extends Point>
Simulation<T>
Simulation.getSimulation(Rule<T> r, Visualization v)
          This is a factory method takes a rule and a visualization and produces a Simulation suitable for viewing the automaton.
